tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE astronaut_profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    certification VARCHAR(100),
    experience INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    biography TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    cert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (astronaut_id) REFERENCES astronauts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE experience (
    exp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (astronaut_id) REFERENCES astronauts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    cert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(100),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (astronaut_id) REFERENCES astronauts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    mission VARCHAR(50),
    duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (astronaut_id) REFERENCES astronauts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(100),
    duration_days INT
);
